title: Chocolate mousse cheesecake
ingredients: ['115g (4oz) chocolate biscuits, crushed', '1 pinch ground cinnamon', '2 (100g) bars dark chocolate', '1 tablespoon butter', '2 (200g) tubs cream cheese, softened', '1 (227ml) carton double cream', '1 teaspoon vanilla essence', '150g (5oz) caster sugar', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 1/2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '350ml (12 fl oz) water']
